product_name: Core Concepts January Jacket - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With classic lines, a cozy fleece lining and protection from rain and snow, the women's Core Concepts January Jacket can take you to any stop on your winter itinerary. Waterproof, windproof and breathable stretch-polyester jacket keeps you dry and comfortable. High collar and brushed fleece lining add warmth. Oversize magnetic buttons adorn the asymmetrical zip front. Flared cuffs over fleece-lined inner cuffs offer coverage plus style. Interior zippered chest pocket keeps your phone always handy; zippered hand pockets stow small essentials. Overstock.
short_description: With classic lines, a cozy fleece lining and protection from rain and snow, the women's Core Concepts January Jacket can take you to any stop on your winter itinerary.
